name: Junyo
tag_list: children, education, adaptive-learning, edtech, edutech, elearning, blended-learning
overview:
Junyo’s data-analytics platform measures learning and empowers K-12 educators to make data-driven decisions that can customize learning and improve student success.

We use real-time feedback and dashboards to help teachers visualize student progress and to help students stay motivated and engaged. Our analytics platform will provide actionable insights and recommendations tailored to each student’s needs, abilities and interests.

For the 2012-13 school year, we’re working with leading innovative schools, researchers and entrepreneurs as we collectively learn about learning and instigate systemic change.

video_embeds.description: Junyo CEO Steve Schoettler on Learning Analytics
